title: Jesus Sanchez Attended a Virtual Student Event

description: On June 1st, Jesus had the opportunity to participate in the First Colloquium of Research and Innovation in Business Management held at the ITSSPC (Technical Institute of San Pedro de las Colonias). The two-day event hosted various talks and workshops. Jesus contributed to the event by conducting a virtual "Employability Workshop," where he shared his experience as a Justia Mexico employee of more than ten years.
